name: FIT
description: The FIT token is the BEP20 (BSC) token that represents the cryptocurrency of the worldâ€™s first tokenized gym. So, ordinary people earn and use these tokens for improving training and accessing exclusive sports products. Simultaneously, trainers receive tokens for achieving individual and collective results. Also, crypto users get extra incentives for staking and farming $FIT tokens by providing liquidity. Moreover, the team has already implemented the coin in the Slowfit sports centers and the training academy in Strength Resistance Institute. The team plans to integrate FIT tokens into 200 sports centers centers and gyms within the next four years.
